item.value: extanshion Checkout
denied Callback

if this field contains a value you need to show an error message to the user. possible values: ALREADY_EXISTS (if the user already have this payment method) NOT_ALLOWED (if the user tried to enter a card of a blocked user) or GENERAL_ERROR

Removes a user payment method. NOTE! if a user used a payment method to get approval for an auction his approval would be canceled. the user should be warned about this before he proceeds with the payment method deletion. Also - a user cannot remove his payment method if he has unpaid bills, or absentee bids in non ended auctions (if he will try the server would return an error PAYMENT_METHOD_IN_USE).
